message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1000000 to you, and I believe it could significantly impact your endeavors positively. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $900000. I trust that this offer will not only be beneficial for you but also represent a fair transaction for both parties involved. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
